title: Port ready, next, and blocked commands to Cobra
description: Migrate ready (list unblocked tasks), next (get next task for epic), and blocked (list blocked tasks) commands to Cobra. Preserve --include-manual and other flags.
closed_reason: Ported ready, next, and blocked commands to Cobra. Created ready.go (--include-awaiting, --include-manual deprecated, filter flags), next.go (--awaiting with empty-means-any semantics, --epic, --include-manual), and blocked.go (simple owner/json flags). Added routing in main.go.
